pdftron.Filters

Class ASCII85Encode

  • java.lang.Object
    • pdftron.Filters.Filter
      • pdftron.Filters.ASCII85Encode

  • public class ASCII85Encode
extends Filter
    ASCII85Encode filter can be used to encode any data stream into a stream that does not contain any binary characters.
